body_html: It is actually a Python bug that is described here. According to this post, it could be solved by using pickle protocol 4. An example to override this setting in the multiprocessing lib is found at StackOverflow.
body_text: It is actually a Python bug that is described here. According to this post, it could be solved by using pickle protocol 4. An example to override this setting in the multiprocessing lib is found at StackOverflow.
body: It is actually a Python bug that is described [here](https://bugs.python.org/issue17560). According to this [post](https://github.com/stan-dev/pystan/issues/197), it could be solved by using pickle protocol 4. An [example](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45119053/how-to-change-the-serialization-method-used-by-pythons-multiprocessing) to override this setting in the multiprocessing lib is found at StackOverflow.
